features: Rechargeable OneBlade 360 Face plus Body can trim, edge, and shave any length of hair. Shave is not too close so your skin stays comfortable.
The innovative 360 Blade can flex in all directions to adjust to the curves of your face. The design enables constant skin contact and control.
Includes 2 blades, 1 360 blade for your face and 1 blade for your body. Use wet or dry, with or without foam.
Click-on skin guard for extra protection on sensitive areas, even below the belt.
Includes a 5-in-1 stubble comb plus 1 body comb for an even trim on face or body
USB-A charging cable included (wall power adapter not included).
body.description: Philips Norelco OneBlade 360 Face + Body trims, edges and shaves any length of hair, even on body. OneBlade 360 Face + Body includes one blade for your face, and another blade with a click-on skin guard for your body. The unique OneBlade shaving technology integrates a fast moving cutter (12000x per minute) with a dual protection system to give you an efficient comfortable shave on longer hairs. The innovative 360 Blade can flex in all directions to adjust to the curves of your face. Easily trim and shave hard‐to‐reach areas — with few strokes and great comfort. OneBlade does not shave too close, so your skin stays comfortable. Click on the 5-in-1 stubble comb for face or use the additional blade with click-on skin guard and 3mm body comb for a fast and even trim on your body and below-the-belt. Forget about using multiple tools, OneBlade 360 Face + Body does it all. OneBlade is fully waterproof, so it is easy to clean. Just rinse it under the tap. You can shave wet or dry, even in the shower. No shaving foam needed. Stainless steel blade lasts up to 4 months of use** to keep that fresh feel. An eject icon will appear on the blade when it's time to consider changing the blade for the best shaving experience. The Lithuim Ion battery delivers up to 60 minutes of run time after a 4 hour charge. USB-A charging cable included (wall power adapter not included).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This razor is absolutely phenomenal. The quality is top class for the price. I have always used a manual razor and this was my first electric razor. I’d say, that the time it saves myself in the morning to shave with this razor has been dramatic. There is no need for shaving cream, and you don’t really have to worry about cutting yourself. The razor itself has a couple of attachments that have been nice. It has a skin guard which makes it even more difficult to cut yourself and I’ve predominantly used that guard when shaving my body. I will say, I was able to shave my whole body in under a half hour using this razor, which includes shaving legs, arms, and everything else except for the hair on my head. It has a pretty ergonomic grip, so it doesn’t feel awkward, and the silicone on the handle allows for a decent grip even when wet. The battery life of this razor is also spectacular, I’ve used the razor for over a month daily and only have had to charge it once, which was when I took it out of the box for the first time. This razor has allowed me to enjoy shaving instead of dreading it. I would recommend this razor to anyone that didn’t already have one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So let's get into the OneBlade. Overall - a very good device. Some things to consider however.FACE------For shaving it'll cut down even the tallest beards. You see stuff in the ads and it performs just as well. Just remember that there are various hair and skin types. Some persons may be able to get a clean shave easily, but others may have problems getting it clean. Personally - I tried to get it clean after a clean shave about a week prior, but it didn't do as good a job as I'd think. Interestingly, my wife took the OneBlade and and went over the same spots that I had - and got a clean shave done. You may need someone else to assist with getting it clean, depending on your hair type and skin type.BODY-------I didn't do full body, but chest and arms (including pits) were clean quite easily. Again, body type and hair type may require more passes.TENDERS-----------The guard for "sensitive areas" makes shaving those parts easy. You won't get as clean a shave with the guard, but it'll get the hairs low enough for other tools to be used.CLEANING-------------It's pretty easy to clean. If you simply run the device while it's in water, or use air (canned or otherwise) you can get it clean quickly. It's best not to brush/rub/touch the blade as that may reduce the life.BATTERY-----------Thus far, I've only charged it once per month. It keeps the charge quite well. Usage is 1-2 times per week and still manages to keep the charge.OVERALL-----------Depending on your body type and hair type, the OneBlade will either give you a clean shave or get it low enough to use another product for the clean shave. If you have someone else to help, it may be possible to get a clean shave.SUMMARY------------With that said - it's a great device. Some persons may need to use another device (razor maybe?) to get a clean shave - but the OneBlade will at least get it low enough to make it much easier for another device (like a razor). Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great shave. Brittle plastic.
reviews.reviewText: This razor has given me the closest, cleanest shave I've ever gotten from an electric razor. It leaves behind no burn, doesn't get away from you, and charges quick.The blades do great work, but the plastic bit that attaches to the main unit is incredibly fragile. I dropped it onto my carpeted floor from 1/2 a meter up and it was rendered unusable.Thankfully, the kit comes with two blades, but with replacements starting at $15, a cushioned drop shouldn't be a deal-breaker.TL;DR don't drop your razor heads and it's the best razor on the market.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as intended, no cuts!
reviews.reviewText: Got it to shave legs, which i have cut myself doing with a regular razor for many times. Crazy to have something i can use for a relatively clean cut and have no risk. I have been relatively careless with it when i use it and im out unscathed. you might have to go over the area a fee times to get everything but it works great. They give you what are equivalent of guards to set a length and they attach easily. Battery life lasts very long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY THIS RAZOR
reviews.reviewText: I have an extremely sensitive face and this razor has never given me razor burn or any agitation. The shave is extremely close and the razor cleans very easily. It doesn't work very well using the guards because the hair gets stuck in the guard and you have to pull it out constantly. I recommend getting the base razor and using it for your face!
Buen producto, ligera, de corte seguro y detallado, llega a lugares que con otras no se puede.

reviews.reviewTitle: La usa regularmente y le gustó mucho
reviews.reviewText: Bien la calidad del producto, muy útil para uso regular.
I like the one-blade. It gives a close shave and trims the entire face & head. Its good.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very effective but safe for private parts
reviews.reviewText: The green protector is very effective in protecting sensitive area of male private parts. Yet the shave is very clean and close. I had shaved only once, but very impressed with overall performance. Will comeback to edit if find anything interesting worth sharing. Thanks.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good one but expensive for longer duration
reviews.reviewText: Works well . But the razar needs regular replacements for people with thicker beard in short duration of time and its expensive to buy the replaceable razar blades !
